name: Avalonia
description: A mystical land in the 'Odyssey' VR universe, filled with ancient magic, diverse biomes, and mysterious adventures.

locations.name: Central Avalonia
locations.description: Central Avalonia stands as the bustling nexus of the mystical land of Avalonia, teeming with life and activity. It's a place where the old meets the new, with ancient architecture seamlessly blending with vibrant marketplaces. The Grand Castle, visible from miles away, dominates the skyline, symbolizing strength and wisdom. The crossroads of various paths lead to different biomes: the mystical Ethereal Plains to the east, the towering Frostwing Mountains to the north, the mysterious Whispering Forest to the west, and the mysterious Sunken Shores to the south. Central Avalonia serves as a hub for adventurers and travelers, offering a diverse range of experiences from shopping at the Mystic Market to seeking wisdom at the Hall of Elders.

npcs.name: Lost Player
npcs.description: A lost player from real life, wandering aimlessly in Central Avalonia.
dialog: Where am I? How did I get here?
I'm so lost. I need to find the way to log out.
Why doesn't my logout button work?!

sublocations.name: Grand Castle
sublocations.description: Dominating the skyline of Central Avalonia, the Grand Castle is a beacon of power and history. Its towering spires and fortified walls are a testament to the ancient magic and architecture of Avalonia. The castle is a labyrinth of grand halls and secret passages, each echoing with tales of yore.

items.name: Ancient Artifact
items.description: A mysterious relic from a bygone era, found in the castle's deepest hall.

items.name: Royal Banner
items.description: A banner representing the heritage of Avalonia, adorning the castle walls.

npcs.name: Monk Jaron
npcs.description: Monk Jaron is a serene and contemplative figure, often seen in the quieter parts of the Grand Castle. Cloaked in simple, unadorned robes, he carries an air of tranquility and wisdom. His eyes, gentle yet perceptive, seem to reflect a deep understanding of the mystical and the historical. He is a guardian of ancient knowledge, often found meditating or studying the arcane texts within the castle's walls.
dialog: Welcome, traveler, to the Grand Castle. May clarity guide your path.
The ancients left many secrets within these walls.
Seek wisdom, but beware the shadows that lurk in forgotten corners.

interactions.description: Retrieve the Lost Tome from Secret Chamber in the Royal Library.

inventory.name: Potion of Clarity
inventory.description: A potion brewed by Monk Jaron that clears the mind and sharpens focus.

rooms.name: Throne Room
rooms.description: The heart of the Grand Castle, the Throne Room is a grandiose hall adorned with ornate tapestries and gleaming armor. The throne itself, a masterpiece of craftsmanship, sits majestically at the far end, a symbol of the kingdom's enduring legacy.

items.name: Ceremonial Sword
items.description: A beautifully crafted sword used in royal ceremonies, displayed prominently in the room.

items.name: Historic Tapestry
items.description: An elaborate tapestry depicting the history of Avalonia, hanging on the walls of the Throne Room.

npcs.name: King Aldor
npcs.description: King Aldor is a dignified and commanding figure, exuding the authority and responsibility of a ruler. His regal attire and kingly demeanor reflect his dedication to the welfare of Avalonia. He is a wise and just monarch, deeply respected by his subjects.
dialog: As ruler of Avalonia, I welcome you to our grand kingdom.
Our land is ancient, and its secrets are many.
Maintaining peace in Avalonia is my solemn duty.

interactions.description: Defend the realm from the encroaching darkness.

inventory.name: Decree of the Realm
inventory.description: An official decree issued by King Aldor, bearing the seal of the kingdom.

npcs.name: Elder Orin
npcs.description: Elder Orin is an aged sage, his face lined with wisdom gained over a lifetime of study. His eyes sparkle with intelligence, and his voice carries the weight of knowledge. Known for his deep understanding of history and magic, he is a revered figure in the castle.
dialog: Knowledge and wisdom are the true foundations of power.
In these ancient scrolls lie the secrets of the past.

inventory.name: Ancient Scroll of Wisdom
inventory.description: A scroll containing ancient wisdom, preserved by Elder Orin.

npcs.name: Queen Mirabelle
npcs.description: Queen Mirabelle is the epitome of grace and benevolence. Her presence is both comforting and inspiring, and she carries an air of serene confidence. Her love for her people and the kingdom is evident in her every action, making her a beloved figure in Avalonia.
dialog: Avalonia thrives under our care and flourishes in peace.
My heart holds deep love for our people and our land.

inventory.name: Amulet of the Ages
inventory.description: A mystical amulet worn by Queen Mirabelle, radiant with ancient energy.

rooms.name: Royal Library
rooms.description: A sanctum of knowledge, the Royal Library houses towering shelves filled with ancient scrolls and books. Soft candlelight flickers across the room, illuminating the wisdom preserved for generations. It's a place of study and discovery, where the past speaks to those who listen.

items.name: Ancient Tome
items.description: A rare and valuable book containing the histories of Avalonia.

items.name: Celestial Globe
items.description: An ornate globe depicting the constellations and celestial bodies, used for astronomical studies.

npcs.name: Lady Elara
npcs.description: Lady Elara is a scholar of ancient history and arcane mysteries. She is often found deep in thought, surrounded by piles of dusty tomes and scrolls.
dialog: In these halls of knowledge, the wisdom of ages is at your fingertips.
Seek and you shall find; the library holds many secrets.

inventory.name: Manuscript of Lost Spells
inventory.description: A manuscript containing forgotten spells and arcane knowledge.

npcs.name: Sir Lorian
npcs.description: Sir Lorian, a knight with a keen interest in historical cartography, often explores the library for ancient maps and legends.
dialog: Maps and scrolls tell of places far beyond these castle walls.
A true knight seeks not only strength but wisdom.

inventory.name: Map to Hidden Treasures
inventory.description: A detailed map leading to hidden treasures across Avalonia.

npcs.name: Scribe Lyra
npcs.description: Scribe Lyra is dedicated to preserving the kingdom's history, always seen with her enchanted quill in hand, transcribing important events and knowledge.
dialog: Every quill stroke is a step towards immortality.
The written word is a powerful tool in discerning hands.

inventory.name: Enchanted Quill
inventory.description: A magical quill that never runs out of ink, used for transcribing important texts.

rooms.name: Secret Chamber
rooms.description: Concealed behind a hidden door in the Royal Library, the Secret Chamber holds the most confidential archives and artifacts of the kingdom. The chamber, shrouded in mystery, is said to contain powerful relics and forbidden knowledge.

items.name: Enchanted Grimoire
items.description: An ancient book of spells bound in shadows, said to hold unimaginable magical powers.

items.name: Orb of Prophecy
items.description: A mysterious crystal orb, pulsating with an inner light, rumored to reveal visions of the future.

items.name: Mystical Tapestry
items.description: A tapestry depicting ancient magical symbols and constellations, adding to the mystical aura of the chamber.

items.name: Alchemist's Set
items.description: An array of alchemical tools and vials, hinting at the experimental nature of the room's previous occupants.

containers.name: Ancient Vault
containers.description: An old, dust-covered vault, rumored to hold items of significant power and mystery.

contains.name: Rune of Shadows
contains.description: A dark rune that holds the essence of shadow magic.

contains.name: Timekeeper's Hourglass
contains.description: An hourglass said to measure more than mere time, potentially connected to ancient time magic.

sublocations.name: Mystic Market
sublocations.description: A bustling hub in the heart of Avalonia, the Mystic Market is a sensory overload of sights, sounds, and scents. Stalls and shops line the crowded streets, offering a plethora of magical artifacts and exotic goods. The air is filled with the aroma of mystical incense, the chatter of bargaining customers, and the occasional sparkle of a newly cast spell.

npcs.name: Shoe Shine Boy
npcs.description: A young boy who shines shoes for a living, often seen in the market. He is a cheerful and friendly figure, always ready to strike up a conversation with passersby. He is a hard worker, and his dedication to his craft is evident in the gleaming shoes he produces. Despite his youth, he seems to know much about the market and its visitors.
dialog: Shiny shoes for a shiny day! Need a polish, traveler?
I've seen all sorts walk through this market. Got any stories to share?
Careful with those magical boots. They need a special touch!

interactions.description: Shoe shining for a small fee.
Tips about the market and its hidden treasures.

inventory.name: Magical Polish
inventory.description: A rare shoe polish that not only cleans but also temporarily enchants footwear.

items.name: Glowing Orb
items.description: A small orb that emits a soft, soothing light, used to illuminate market stalls.

items.name: Enchanted Tapestry
items.description: A large, beautifully woven tapestry depicting scenes of Avalonian lore, hanging in various stalls.

items.name: Magical Wind Chimes
items.description: Delicate wind chimes that play a mystical melody, believed to attract good fortune.

items.name: Crystal Display
items.description: An array of colorful crystals, each shimmering with internal light, used as a centerpiece in several shops.

rooms.name: Enchanted Emporium
rooms.description: The Enchanted Emporium is a wonder to behold, with shelves lined with glowing potions, mystical artifacts, and ancient scrolls. The air is tinged with the scent of magical herbs and the faint hum of enchanted objects. Soft, ethereal light fills the room, casting a magical glow on every surface.

npcs.name: Mirabelle
npcs.description: Mirabelle, the proprietor of the Enchanted Emporium, is a knowledgeable and mysterious figure. She moves gracefully around her shop, her robes trailing behind her. Her eyes sparkle with arcane knowledge, and she always seems to have just the right item for any magical need.
dialog: Ah, a discerning customer! Welcome to the Enchanted Emporium.
You seek something special? Perhaps I can help you find it.
Be careful with that! It's more powerful than it looks.

interactions.description: Trade coins or other valuables for magical items.
Retrieve a rare ingredient for a powerful potion.

inventory.name: Elixir of Wisdom
inventory.description: A potion that temporarily enhances the drinker's intellect and perception.

inventory.name: Shadow Cloak
inventory.description: A cloak that grants the wearer near invisibility in low light.

items.name: Crystal Ball
items.description: A large, clear crystal ball that shimmers with a mysterious inner light.

items.name: Enchanted Lantern
items.description: A lantern that never goes out, illuminating the shop with a soft, magical light.

items.name: Magical Tomes
items.description: Ancient books filled with arcane knowledge, safely kept behind a protective glass case.

items.name: Potion Ingredients
items.description: Various rare and exotic ingredients used in potion-making, displayed in neatly labeled jars.

rooms.name: The Mystic's Corner
rooms.description: Tucked away in a quieter corner of the market, The Mystic's Corner is a haven for those seeking insight into the unknown. Dimly lit by flickering candles and filled with the scent of incense, the room is adorned with symbols of divination and mysticism. Crystal balls, tarot cards, and runic stones are arranged meticulously on draped tables, inviting curiosity and wonder.

npcs.name: Faelan
npcs.description: Faelan, the enigmatic fortune-teller of The Mystic's Corner, is a figure shrouded in mystery. Clad in robes adorned with celestial patterns, he possesses a calm, knowing gaze that seems to pierce through veils of reality. His voice is soft yet captivating, drawing visitors into a world of prophecy and foresight.
dialog: Seeking knowledge of the future? Step forward and be enlightened.
The cards do not lie, but they do not tell the whole truth either.
Your fate is a path yet unwritten. Shall we discover its course together?

interactions.description: Receive a glimpse of possible future events or guidance on a current dilemma.
Buy mystical charms and protective amulets.

inventory.name: Tarot Deck
inventory.description: A beautifully illustrated deck of tarot cards, each imbued with magical properties.

inventory.name: Protective Amulet
inventory.description: A small amulet designed to ward off negative energies and bring good fortune.

items.name: Ornate Divination Table
items.description: A table covered with a star-patterned cloth, used for tarot readings and other divinatory practices.

items.name: Incense Burner
items.description: An intricately carved incense burner, filling the room with soothing, mystical scents.

items.name: Mystical Candles
items.description: Candles that burn with an ethereal flame, providing a mystical ambiance to the corner.

items.name: Runes Set
items.description: A set of ancient runic stones, used for divination and foresight, displayed in a glass case.

rooms.name: The Armorer's Forge
rooms.description: The Armorer's Forge is a place of heat, metal, and craftsmanship. The sound of hammering echoes through the air, mingling with the roar of the furnace. Weapons of various shapes and sizes, some glowing with enchantments, line the walls. Armor stands display masterfully crafted suits, each piece a testament to the skill of the armorer. The forge is a blend of traditional blacksmithing and magical enhancement, creating items both sturdy and mystical.

npcs.name: Gavriel
npcs.description: Gavriel, the master armorer, is a figure of strength and precision. His muscular arms bear the marks of his trade, and his eyes reflect the intense focus of a seasoned craftsman. He is proud of his work and eager to share his expertise in both traditional and magical armory.
dialog: Welcome to my forge. What kind of protection are you seeking today?
Each piece I create has its own story and strength. Choose wisely.
Ah, interested in enchanted armor? You have an eye for quality.

interactions.description: Purchase weapons, armor, and custom enhancements.

inventory.name: Flame-Enchanted Sword
inventory.description: A sword imbued with a magical flame, capable of igniting upon command.

inventory.name: Shadow Mail Armor
inventory.description: A lightweight armor that blends with shadows, providing enhanced stealth.

items.name: Forged Weapons Display
items.description: A variety of weapons, each showcasing the skill and creativity of the forge.

items.name: Armor Mannequins
items.description: Mannequins wearing various styles of armor, from heavy plate to flexible leather.

items.name: Enchantment Anvils
items.description: Anvils used specifically for enchanting weapons and armor, glowing with residual magic.

items.name: Crafting Tools
items.description: An array of blacksmithing tools, well-maintained and organized, essential for the forge's daily operations.

sublocations.name: Hall of Elders
sublocations.description: The Hall of Elders is a sanctum of ancient wisdom and revered traditions. Majestic in its design, the hall features towering columns, intricate murals depicting the history of Avalonia, and shelves lined with age-old tomes and artifacts. The air is filled with a serene silence, occasionally broken by the soft murmur of scholars and the rustling of parchment. This revered place serves as a meeting ground for the wisest elders of Avalonia and as a repository of knowledge gathered over centuries.

npcs.name: Elder Arin
npcs.description: Elder Arin is a venerable figure in the Hall of Elders, known for his deep knowledge and gentle demeanor. His eyes, though aged, sparkle with intelligence and curiosity. He is often found perusing ancient scrolls or engaged in thoughtful discussions with visitors and fellow scholars.
dialog: Welcome, seeker of knowledge. What wisdom do you pursue today?
The annals of history hold many lessons, if one knows where to look.
Patience and understanding are the keys to unlocking the secrets of the past.

interactions.description: Offer insights or help in understanding complex historical or magical concepts.
Assign tasks related to the recovery or preservation of ancient knowledge.

inventory.name: Scroll of Ancient Lore
inventory.description: A delicate scroll containing valuable information about Avalonia's distant past.

items.name: Historic Artifacts
items.description: Artifacts of significant historical value, displayed in protective casings.

items.name: Ancient Manuscripts
items.description: Manuscripts detailing the lore and legends of Avalonia, carefully preserved under glass.

items.name: Wisdom Statues
items.description: Statues of past elders, each carved with intricate detail, standing as guardians of knowledge.

items.name: Mural of Ages
items.description: A large mural covering the walls of the hall, depicting the chronological history of Avalonia.

rooms.name: The Archives
rooms.description: The Archives is a vast repository of ancient knowledge, containing scrolls, books, and artifacts from Avalonia's distant past. The shelves are lined with meticulously labeled tomes, and the air is filled with the scent of old parchment. Scholars and visitors alike can be found perusing the shelves, seeking wisdom from the annals of history.

npcs.name: Scholar Aria
npcs.description: Scholar Aria is a dedicated student of history, often found in the Archives, poring over ancient texts. Her eyes, though young, reflect a deep understanding of the past, and her voice carries the weight of knowledge. She is a diligent scholar, always eager to learn and share her wisdom.
dialog: The past holds many secrets, waiting to be discovered.
The Archives are a treasure trove of knowledge, if one knows where to look.
The annals of history are a guide to the future.

inventory.name: Ancient Scroll
inventory.description: A scroll containing ancient wisdom, preserved by Scholar Aria.

items.name: Ancient Scrolls
items.description: Scrolls containing ancient wisdom, carefully preserved in protective casings.

items.name: Historic Tomes
items.description: Tomes detailing the lore and legends of Avalonia, carefully preserved under glass.

items.name: Historic Artifacts
items.description: Artifacts of significant historical value, displayed in protective casings.

rooms.name: The Study
rooms.description: The Study is a place of quiet contemplation, where scholars can reflect on the knowledge they've gained. The room is filled with comfortable chairs and tables, each adorned with a small lamp. The walls are lined with bookshelves, and the air is filled with the scent of old parchment. It's a place of serenity and reflection, where the past speaks to those who listen.

npcs.name: Scholar Elyse
npcs.description: Scholar Elyse is a seasoned historian, her face lined with wisdom gained over a lifetime of study. Her eyes sparkle with intelligence, and her voice carries the weight of knowledge. She is a revered figure in the Hall of Elders, known for her deep understanding of history and magic.
dialog: The past is a guide to the future, if one knows where to look.
The annals of history hold many lessons, if one knows where to look.
Patience and understanding are the keys to unlocking the secrets of the past.

inventory.name: Ancient Manuscript
inventory.description: A manuscript containing forgotten spells and arcane knowledge.

items.name: Historic Tomes
items.description: Tomes detailing the lore and legends of Avalonia, carefully preserved under glass.

items.name: Historic Artifacts
items.description: Artifacts of significant historical value, displayed in protective casings.

items.name: Historic Scrolls
items.description: Scrolls containing ancient wisdom, carefully preserved in protective casings.

rooms.name: The Library
rooms.description: The Library is a place of study and discovery, where the past speaks to those who listen. The shelves are lined with ancient scrolls and books, and the air is filled with the scent of old parchment. Scholars and visitors alike can be found perusing the shelves, seeking wisdom from the annals of history.

npcs.name: Scholar Elyse
npcs.description: Scholar Elyse is a seasoned historian, her face lined with wisdom gained over a lifetime of study. Her eyes sparkle with intelligence, and her voice carries the weight of knowledge. She is a revered figure in the Hall of Elders, known for her deep understanding of history and magic.
dialog: The past is a guide to the future, if one knows where to look.
The annals of history hold many lessons, if one knows where to look.
Patience and understanding are the keys to unlocking the secrets of the past.

inventory.name: Ancient Manuscript
inventory.description: A manuscript containing forgotten spells and arcane knowledge.

items.name: Historic Tomes
items.description: Tomes detailing the lore and legends of Avalonia, carefully preserved under glass.

items.name: Historic Artifacts
items.description: Artifacts of significant historical value, displayed in protective casings.

items.name: Historic Scrolls
items.description: Scrolls containing ancient wisdom, carefully preserved in protective casings.
